summary: Defines the Options class that stores and manages all declarative configuration and runtime metadata for Django ORM models, including field definitions, managers, inheritance structures, and relationship mappings, as well as supporting utilities for handling immutable fields and normalization.
business_intent: Enable Django models to introspect, validate, and interact with their schema and relationships by centralizing model options and providing mechanisms for field ordering, inheritance handling, and metaâ€‘option processing.
